t=int(input())
for i in range(t):
 ans=0
 x,y=list(map(int,input().split()))
 if y>x:
  if (y-x)%4==0:ans=3
  elif (y-x)%2==0: ans=2
  else: ans=1
 if y<x:
  if (y-x)%2==0:ans=1
  else: ans=2
 print(ans)

def check(x,y,count):
 if x == y:
  print(count)
for i in range(int(input())):
 count = 0
 x,y = list(map(int, input().split()))
 diff = x-y
 if diff > 0:
  if diff%2==0:
   x = x - diff
   count+=1
   check(x,y,count)
  else:
   x = x - (diff+1)
   count+=1
   x = x + 1
   count+=1
   check(x,y,count)
 elif diff == 0:
  print("0")
 else:
  diff = abs(diff)
  if diff%2!=0:
   x = x + diff
   count+=1
   check(x,y,count)
  elif diff%4==0:
   x = x + (diff+1)
   count+=1
   x = x - (diff+2)
   count+=1
   x = x + (diff+1)
   count+=1
   check(x,y,count)
  else:
   a = diff/2
   x = x + a
   count+=1
   x = x + a
   count+=1
   check(x,y,count)
